rukus.text: 74|32|aisee baat nahin, shapath hai chaand kee
74|33|tatha raatri kee, jab vyateet hone lage
74|34|aur praatah kee, jab prakaashit ho jaaye
74|35|vaastav mein, (narak) ek[1] bahut badee cheez hai.
74|36|daraane ke lie logon ko.
74|37|usake lie tumamen se, jo chaahe[1] aage hona athava peechhe rahana.
74|38|pratyek praanee apane karmon ke badale mein bandhak hai.
74|39|daahine vaalon ke siva.
74|40|ve svargon mein honge. ve prashn karenge.
74|41|aparaadhiyon se.
74|42|tumhen kya cheez le gayee narak mein.
74|43|ve kahengeh ham nahin the namaaziyon mein se.
74|44|aur nahin bhojan karaate the nirdhan ko.
74|45|tatha kured karate the kured karane vaalon ke saath.
74|46|aur ham jhuthalaaya karate the pratiphal ke din (pralay) ko.
74|47|yahaan tak ki hamaaree maut aa gaee.
74|48|to unhen laabh nahin degee shifaarishiyon (abhistaavakon) kee shifaarish.
74|49|to unhen kya ho gaya hai ki is shiksha (quraan) se munh pher rahe hain
74|50|maano ve (jangalee) gadhe hain, bidakaaye hue.
74|51|jo shikaaree se bhaage hain.
74|52|balki chaahata hai pratyek vyakti unamen se ki use khulee[1] pustak dee jaaye.
74|53|kadaapi ye nahin (ho sakata) balki ve aakhirat (paralok) se nahin darate hain.
74|54|nishchay ye (quraan) to ek shiksha hai.
74|55|ab jo chaahe, shiksha grahan kare.
74|56|aur ve shiksha grahan nahin kar sakate, parantu ye ki allaah chaah le. vahee yogy hai ki usase dara jaaye aur yogy hai ki kshama kar de.
